revised_title: Absorption Spectra of Alkaloids: A New Method for Identifying and Quantifying Alkaloids
tldr: The author investigates the absorption spectra of various alkaloids using a new method that involves exposing them to ultra-violet rays. This method allows for the identification and quantification of alkaloids, as well as the determination of their purity. The author also discusses the differences in absorption spectra between different types of alkaloids and their molecular structures.
